tool.name: tool_3

param.name: FIELD
param.dialogReference:
Attribute

Table field

optional

attribute to be searched; if not set all attributes will be searched

param.name: COMPARE
param.dialogReference:
Select if...

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] attribute is identical with search expression

[1] attribute contains search expression

[2] attribute is contained in search expression

Default: 1

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Method

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] new selection

[1] add to current selection

[2] select from current selection

[3] remove from current selection

Default: 0

tool.summary: Searches for an character string expression in the attributes table and selects records where the expression is found.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
